reviews.review_msg: Extremely rude and unprofessional. Worst crim prof at sfu

I will NEVER take a class from her again. Poorly organized and very unaccessable. She wasn't around for 1/2 the term and the guest lecturers were more willing to help me than she was. She became very upset when I asked her to clarify what she wanted for the paper worth 60%. Very intelligent but a horrible teacher.
